sentences.en: 70,000 tonnes of oil spilled from the tanker.
A Greek oil tanker has run aground.
A thousand tons of crude oil has spilled into the sea from an oil tanker.
sentences.cn: 1,000吨原油从一艘油轮中泄漏，流入了海洋。

sentences.en: An oil tanker spewed its cargo into the sea.
sentences.cn: 一艘油轮将装载的油全都泄入了大海。

sentences.en: Crewmen aboard the tanker sighted a ship in distress off the coast of Senegal.
sentences.cn: 油船上的船员们在塞内加尔的近海发现了一艘失事的船.

sentences.en: It remains possible that bad weather could tear more holes in the tanker's hull.
sentences.cn: 恶劣天气仍然可能使油轮船体遭受更多破损。

sentences.en: Last night a cargo ship collided with a tanker carrying crude oil.
sentences.cn: 昨晚一艘货轮与一艘载着原油的油轮相撞.

sentences.en: Leaking oil spewed from the tanker.
sentences.cn: 泄漏的油从油轮里涌出。

sentences.en: The lorry clipped the rear of a tanker and then crashed into a second truck.
sentences.cn: 大货车斜撞上一辆油罐车的尾部，接着又撞上了另一辆货车。

sentences.en: the salvage of the wrecked tanker
The sinking of the tanker has made aspects of marine pollution particularly topical.
sentences.cn: 油轮的沉没使得海洋污染的方方面面都成为眼下大家尤为关注的热点话题。

sentences.en: The tanker began spilling oil the moment her outer plating ruptured.
sentences.cn: 油轮外部金属板覆层破裂的那一瞬间，油开始外溢。

sentences.en: The tanker began to spill its cargo of oil.
The tanker is stuck fast on the rocks.
sentences.cn: 油轮紧卡在礁石中间动弹不得。

sentences.en: They talked modestly of their valiant efforts to keep the tanker afloat.
sentences.cn: 他们说起自己设法使油轮漂浮的英勇之举时非常谦虚。

phrases.tran_cn: 化学液体船；化学品运输船
油槽车，运油车；飞机油箱

trans.tran_cn: 油罐车，油轮，一辆坦克乘员中的一名
trans.tran_en: a vehicle or ship specially built to carry large quantities of gas or liquid, especially oil
